summary: Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience specializing in backend development using Laravel (PHP) and Express (Node.js), with frontend proficiency in React. Skilled in API design, database optimization, and automation using Python and Bash. Proficient in containerizing and deploying applications using Docker and Nginx in production environments. Adept at handling large datasets and writing efficient SQL queries. Committed to building clean, maintainable, and scalable solutions
